Game.Name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge (USA)
Game.plot: Following F1 Grand Prix Nakajima Satoru, Varie produced another racing simulation using the license. This time the racing is from a first person view aping Super Monaco Grand Prix. The car setup can be modified before you take to the trackThere is a Time Attack mode, allowing you to go for as fast a laptime as possible on any of the game's 20 circuits (which include the 16 tracks of the 1992 Formula 1 season), as well as a full season mode, with qualifying and the race itself.
